div.div: The Special Education Online Parent Survey will be opened on April 15, 2020, and will be available for completion in English and Spanish. If you have any questions or need assistance, please contact the Special Education Department at 276-228-5411.
div.a: Read More about 2019-2020 Special Education Parent Survey

div.div: Starting April 14, 2020 and running through May 29, 2020 Wythe County Public Schools will shift from district-wide access to learning materials, to teacher-directed access in a distance learning format. Students will now receive their instruction directly from their assigned classroom teacher. The school division has updated the W C P S At-Home Learning Site to reflect the new teacher-directed platform. The site will now link you to each school’s individual web page. Please go to your school's home page for more details on their distance learning plan. Please take time to read the attached letter from our Instructional Department along with the guidance on Frequently Asked Questions. We will still provide at-home learning packets to students who prefer or need this method instead of online learning. Please contact your school’s principal to request this service. Take care and stay safe! We are also very grateful to our families, for investing a portion of their day, to keep students' minds sharp while we are required to close our schools. Thank You, Stay Healthy, and Take Care!
div.a: Read More about WCPS At-Home Learning Plan Update

p.span: The mission of Wythe County Public Schools, in partnership with our community, is to ensure students are empowered with the knowledge and skills necessary to meet the challenges of the future.

em.style: font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: 14.08px; letter-spacing: 0.3px; text-align: center;

span.span: Wythe County Public School websites are in the process of being updated to ensure compliance with Section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act and Title II of the Americans with Disabilities Act.
Interim website accessibility concerns may be brought to the attention of
